para.text: State Board. After the close of registration for each election, but prior to election day, the State Administrator shall take appropriate measures to notify each pre-qualified voter how to find the individual’s correct polling place. When feasible, the State Administrator shall send a pre-election mailing to each pre-qualified voter, which shall include the correct polling place for the pre-qualified voter’s address.
Local Board. A local board shall include in each specimen ballot information about how a voter can change the voter’s address during early voting.
